description: Try our easy to follow Farfalle with Vegetable Carbonara Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carbonara,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Farfalle with Vegetable Carbonara Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup light and creamy evaporated milk

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add zucchini and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes until tender. Stir in peas and cook for 3 minutes.
Cook farfalle pasta following packet instructions. Drain and return to saucepan.

Whisk evaporated milk, eggs and parmesan in a bowl. Add to hot pasta and toss until combined. Add vegetable mixture and toss until combined. Transfer to serving bowls. Top with mint and shaved parmesan. Serve with freshly ground black pepper.
